docs.snippet: Former Los Angeles Dodgers owner Frank McCourt testified on Friday that safety was a top priority at the stadium and he denied responsibility for any gaps in security that lead to the brutal beating of a baseball fan on opening day in 2011....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Los Angeles Dodgers owner Frank McCourt testified on Friday that safety was a top priority at the stadium and he denied responsibility for any gaps in security that lead to the brutal beating of a baseball fan on opening day in 2011.

headline.main: Former Dodgers Owner Testifies in Baseball Fan Beating Case
headline.print_headline: Former Dodgers Owner Testifies in Baseball Fan Beating Case

docs.snippet: Brazil striker Fred has defended his actions that led to the controversial penalty in the World Cup opener against Croatia, saying he was clearly fouled....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil striker Fred has defended his actions that led to the controversial penalty in the World Cup opener against Croatia, saying he was clearly fouled.

headline.main: Brazil's Fred Says It Was a 'Clear Penalty' on Him
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Fred Says It Was a 'Clear Penalty' on Him

docs.snippet: Attention is turning to an old battle that is raging again in Iraq, where Sunni militants are seizing cities and moving closer to Baghdad....
docs.abstract: Attention is turning to an old battle that is raging again in Iraq, where Sunni militants are seizing cities and moving closer to Baghdad.

headline.main: What's News in Washington: Focus Returns to Iraq

docs.snippet: The San Antonio Spurs left Miami last June looking so human, Tim Duncan nearly in tears talking about how close they were to another championship....
